department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Standing Male Figure with Hat, wood, African (Nigerian, Ijo), XXc on base cat. card dims H 32' Figure wears European hat, medicine gourd suspended from neck; feet are missing.
text: These figures are placed in shrines honoring powerful spirits. This figure wears a European hat to show his importance. A small bottle of protective magic hangs around his neck.
title: Shrine Figure
